body:
I had an idea during my commute on how to relocate buildcaches to a directory layout that is different than the current layout. I depends on being able to reconstructing the rpath from the spec stored with the buildcache. If this is possible, then the buildcache could be created with binaries that have the rpaths removed. Upon installation the reconstructed rpath would be added to the binaries. 

@tgamblin  do you think reconstructing the rpaths is possible?
title: Feature: buildcache relocation with different layout and compiler location
